Description: On I-95 at mile marker 119 in the County of Spotsylvania, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The south right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On US-211 in the County of Page, in the vicinity of Kauffmans Mill Rd; Rt. 646N/S (Page County), motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle fire. The west right lane and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Fire

Description: On I-81 at mile marker 239.2 in the County of Rockingham, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle fire. All south lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Fire

Description: On I-81 at mile marker 284.7 in the County of Shenandoah, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. All south lanes are closed.
